changes: Updated internal dependencies.
Updated internal dependencies.
Dark theme support.
The component prop interface now correctly accepts all native properties in React.
Updated internal dependencies.
Fixed a bug where Pagination would not emit a new value if the last page only contained a single item.
Resolved an bug where Pagination failed to include the last index when on the final page.
Resolved an bug where Pagination would incorrectly select a page during initialization.
dropdownSelectedItemIndexOnChange now emits its value before valueOnChange.
Dropdown dependency update.
Pagination now correctly emits its correct values after user interaction.
Resolved a bug that caused an incorrect internal state when both the dropdownSelectedItemIndex and value were set simultaneously
Pagination now supports dark theme.
Fixed a bug where Pagination would emit an incorrect value, resulting from a multiplication with an unexpected factor.
Fixed a bug where Pagination would emit incorrect values when changing the dropdown value while on a selected page other than 1.
Fixed a bug where Pagination would emit its default values when initiated.
Fixed a bug where Pagination would not respect its given default value.
Fixed a bug where large numbers would not fit inside the dropdown.
Update internal dependencies.
Fix broken type export.
Long numbers doesn't fit in page dots.
Bug fix for updating showing page-numbers
Fix that removes page-numbers when there is only one page
Improved how the pagination handles changes in the dropdown when not on the 1st page.
The component has been refactored. This causes some changes to the DOM structure, but should not affect the styling or API.
Fixed a bug that caused the pagination to not always dispatch an event when changing the value in the dropdown.
Use newest version of @elvia/elvis-dropdown.
Updated @elvia/elvis-dropdown dependency to ^5.2.0 for accessibility improvements.
Reduced bundle size by improving the way icons are imported and used.
Add roving focus keyboard navigation to button list.
The component config has been moved into each component.
Updated dependencies on internal packages.
Added support for React 18.
Use @elvia/elvis-dropdown@^5.0.1.
Use @elvia/elvis-dropdown@^5.0.0.
Use @elvia/elvis-component-wrapper@^3.0.1. This fixes an issue where the component would not properly unmount when used as webcomponent.
Use @elvia/elvis-component-wrapper@^3.0.0.
The paginator now displays its numbers with digit group separators.
Fixed a bug where the paginator would overflow rather than wrap to a new line.
Use @elvia/elvis-toolbox@5.0.0
Update @elvia/elvis-dropdown dependency from ^3.0.0 to ^4.0.0
Update internal styles to prevent the dropdown to become taller due to changes in the internal styles of the Dropdown component
Update dependency @elvia/elvis-toolbox to 4.0.0
Fix version dependency on @elvia/elvis-icon.
Upgrade to toolbox v2.0.0
Reworked the way the component is declared as a module, and how types are exported for React.
A lot of code refactoring to make the component more simple and understandable.
Changed the layout of how many numbers are displayed, to make it smoother and not jump around when selecting numbers.
Bumped the dependency on @elvia/elvis-typography. This adds support for mobile font properties.
Renamed several props for more consistent naming conventions.
fixes: Combine the props labelDisplaying, labelOf, and label into the new labelOptions prop.
Change prop isRightAligned to alignment. No longer a boolean, but instead either 'left' or 'right'.

changes: Small patch fixing sonarcloud bug.
Adjusted the width for the dropdown within the pagination
Added support for native events in React.
Small fixes for better accessibility.
Fixed an issue causing problems for events in non-React environments for props with falsy values. This  update bumps the dependency on @elvia/elvis-component-wrapper.
Now using correct type for webcomponent wrapper for better internal IntelliSense.
Fixed issue where wrong selection number is calculated when the pagination component is initiated with  different selectedDropdownItemIndex value than default.
Now using elvis-icon package for internal icons.

Pagination prop "dropdownItemsDefaultIndex" has been renamed to "selectedDropdownItemIndex". We have also  added a callback function for this value called "selectedDropdownItemIndexOnChange", that gets called  everytime a value change occurs in the dropdown used within the pagination. Just replace prop name  "dropdownItemsDefaultIndex" with the new name "selectedDropdownItemIndex" to fix any issues with the  pagination.
Added prop to set defualt value in pagination dropdown
Added inlineStyle and className props
Added aria-labels to pagination arrow buttons
Updated dependencies
Refactoring
Added support for max limit on last number. The 'lastNumberLimit' prop hides last number to jump to if the  amount of items reaches the given limit.
Pagnination no longer shows two of the same numbers when items is less than option range.
Updated tokens declarations
Added unit tests.
Now using elvis-colors package for colors.
Now using elvis-typography package for typography.
Web component wrapper fix
Pagination build with new wrapper version
Reformated config file
Fixed isRightAligned prop, now working again for web components
First version of paginator.
